mapper.insert: insert into user (user_name, user_password, user_email, user_profile_image_url, user_register_date) values (#{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{userEmail}, '', now())
mapper.select: select user_seq, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_profile_image_url, user_register_date from user where user_email = #{userEmail} and user_name = #{userName}
